languages.text:
Измените точку зрения! Перемещайте или вращайте и приближайте камеру с помощью {console_bind|RightStick}. Для переключения режима управления камерой нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
Нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы вернуть камеру на персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
Измените точку зрения! Перемещайте или вращайте и приближайте камеру с помощью {console_bind|RightStick}. Для переключения режима управления камерой нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
Нажмите {console_bind|Decline}, чтобы вернуть камеру на персонажа.

languages.text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.
languages.original_text:
Измените точку зрения! Перемещайте или вращайте и приближайте камеру с помощью {console_bind|RightStick}. Для переключения режима управления камерой нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}.
Нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы вернуть камеру на персонажа.

traits.locale_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

languages.text:
¡Cambia de punto de vista! Mueve, gira y acerca la cámara con {console_bind|RightStick}. Pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para cambiar entre distintos modos de control de cámara.
Pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para reubicar la cámara en el personaje.
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

traits.locale_text:
¡Cambia de punto de vista! Mueve, gira y acerca la cámara con {console_bind|RightStick}. Pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para cambiar entre distintos modos de control de cámara.
Pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para reubicar la cámara en el personaje.

languages.text:
視点を変えよう！{console_bind|RightStick}を使用してカメラを移動、回転、ズームする。カメラ操作モードを切り替えたい時は、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。
{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押して、カメラをキャラクターの中心に戻す。
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

traits.locale_text:
視点を変えよう！{console_bind|RightStick}を使用してカメラを移動、回転、ズームする。カメラコントロールモードを切り替えたい時は、{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押す。
{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押して、カメラをキャラクターの中心に戻す。

languages.text:
您可以随心所欲改变视角！使用{console_bind|RightStick}来移动、旋转、缩放视角。按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}可在多种视角控制模式之间切换。
按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}可将视角重新还原至您的角色身上。
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

traits.locale_text:
您可以随心所欲改变视角！使用{console_bind|RightStick}来移动、旋转、缩放视角。按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}可在多种视角控制模式之间切换。
按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}可将视角重新还原至您的角色身上。

languages.text:
Ändere deinen Blickwinkel! Bewege, drehe und zoome die Kamera mit {console_bind|RightStick}. Drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um zwischen verschiedenen Kamerasteuerungsmodi zu wechseln.
Drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um die Kamera erneut auf den Charakter zu zentrieren.
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

traits.locale_text:
Ändere deinen Blickwinkel! Bewege, drehe und zoome die Kamera mit {console_bind|RightStick}. Drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um zwischen verschiedenen Kamerasteuerungsmodi zu wechseln.
Drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um die Kamera erneut auf den Charakter zu zentrieren.

languages.text:
Changez de point de vue ! Déplacez la caméra, faites-la pivoter et effectuez un zoom à l'aide de {console_bind|RightStick}. Appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour basculer entre les différents modes de contrôle de la caméra.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour recentrer la caméra sur le personnage.
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.

traits.locale_text:
Changez de point de vue ! Déplacez, faites pivoter et zoomez la caméra à l’aide de {console_bind|RightStick}. Appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour basculer entre les différents modes de contrôle de la caméra.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour recentrer la caméra sur le personnage.

languages.text:
Bakış açını değiştir! {console_bind|RightStick} ile kamerayı oynat, çevir veya yakınlaştır. {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine basarak farklı kamera kontrol modları arasında geçiş yap.
{console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine basarak karakteri kameranın merkezine al.
languages.original_text:
Change your point of view! Move, rotate, and zoom the camera using {console_bind|RightStick}. Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to switch between different camera control modes.
Press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to re-centre the camera on the character.
